text: ( Source : Richard Blumenthal ) Friday, October 9, 2015 ( Hartford, CT ) â€“ U.S. Senator Richard Blumenthal (D-Conn.), member of the Senate Committee on Commerce , Science , and Transportation , issued the following statement on new steps announced
